title: Show 51 - Jacqui Smith
itunes:title: Show 51 - Jacqui Smith
itunes:subtitle: Former Home Secretary Jacqui Smith tells Matt aboâ€¦
description:
Former Home Secretary Jacqui Smith tells Matt about what's it like taking protection to an Aston Villa game, the realities of Cabinet meetings, the pressures of being Home Secretary and why politicians shouldn't work with cats. You can follow Matt on Twitter here: @mattforde and Jacqui here: @jacqui_smith1 For tickets to the live shows, including the Christmas specials on 6 and 7 December and all of Matt's tour dates, go to www.mattforde.com/live

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
